activities: We receive some personal information supplied directly by our users, including name, email address, birth year, postal code, and gender. We collect this information at the time the user signs up for or interacts with our services. We use this information to improve the quality of our services and customer support.
personaldata: Any personal data supplied by our customers at the time they sign up for our services is covered by our self-certification.
recoursemech: We have contracted with JAMS ADR (http://www.jamsadr.com/safeharbor/) to provide independent dispute resolution.
